title: Is there any 100% free online doctor service with no sign up? - Quora

response.answer_text: I hope not! What you are asking for could only be sustained with questionable practices. Are you willing to : Agree that no one in the organization is responsible for the diagnosis?Agree you could never take legal action no matter what they recommend or not?Agree to waive all your rights if something happens and you get sicker or die?What you are asking in a free service like this would not be sustainable. Would you be willing to work for free? “You get what you pay for” is still as true today as ever.
